title: Folding Fork, ca. 1720–50
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Fork has two long tines, slightly bending outwards. Decorative chiseling at the joint. Flat tapering neck. Pistol-shaped brass handle with scrolled end. Brass scales with dogs, deer, a boar, a fox and a bird. Trees and acanthus scrolls against a matte background. Fork folds partly into the handle.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Folding Fork, ca. 1720–50.
ca. 1720–50. brass, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-260.
